title: Mackerel with rhubarb and orange sauce
ingredients: ['4 whole mackerel, gutted and cleaned', '1 large bunch of parsley or thyme stalks', '3 tablespoons chopped chervil to garnish', 'For the sauce', '450g (1lb) rhubarb, chopped', 'Finely grated zest and juice of ½ orange', '15g (½ oz) butter', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', 'Salt and black pepper']
